2007-03-21

I think Kristin was cold

I love Kristin Hersh's new(ish) album Learn to Sing Like a Star, but I think I may love her blog posts more than her music - they always make me laugh so much...

Billy swears into the mic in front of the freezing children and then looks ill. He tries to apologize and somehow swears again in the apology. He shoots me a distressed look.

"Harder than it looks, isn't it?" I say.

"Hell, yeah..." he covers the mic with his hand. "Is 'hell' a swear?"


throwingmusic: Tour Diary - Part 3
